meaningMnemonic: In <radical>prison</radical>, your <radical>task</radical> is to bend things into different <kanji>angle</kanji>s and then put them in the <kanji>corner</kanji>. No one will tell you why you're doing this, but you get a couple cents an hour to do it, so you aren't going to complain.
readingMnemonic: To get the <kanji>angle</kanji> right you find that you have to <reading>cock</reading> (かく) your head to the side a lot. After cocking your head at weird angles so much you also start to hear cocks crowing in your head. Cock-co-cock-co-caww!
